data.name: All_Folders_Query
data.value: <View Scope='RecursiveAll'><Query><OrderBy><FieldRef Name='FileLeafRef' /></OrderBy><Where><And><Neq><FieldRef Name='FileLeafRef'/><Value Type='Text'>{0}</Value></Neq><Eq><FieldRef Name='FSObjType' /><Value Type='Integer'>1</Value></Eq></And></Where></Query><ViewFields><FieldRef Name='FolderChildCount' /><FieldRef Name='FileDirRef' /><FieldRef Name='FileLeafRef' /></ViewFields></View>
data.comment: Query to get complete folder hierarchy within the specified library
